{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WAP55AG |revision=v1.0 |asin= |fcc_date=03/12/2003 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WX5541 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=PKW-WAP55AG |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4702;BCM4702KPB, TN0309 P10, 70627A N; |cpu1_cspeed=125 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV320DB-90EI |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Dynachips |ram1_model=D98SD6416AH-6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=2 |jtag= |serial=no,, UART |wi1_module=Gemtek WL-550 (Linksys) |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5210 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5110 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=a |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_module=Broadcom BCM94306MP |wi2_module_if=Mini PCI |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4306 |wi2_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L;AC101LKQT, TN0312 P11, 71538A; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;2.4.20; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid=linksys-a,linksys-g |default_ssid_regex=^linksys-a$,,,^linksys-g$ |default_ip=192.168.1.246 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:0C:41 |oui_eth=00:0C:41 }} {{TagLine|Dual-Band Wireless Access Point}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WAP55AG}}
*OEM: [[Gemtek]] WX5541 (WX5541_V00), the same board as used by :[[Linksys WAP54G v1.0]]/[[Linksys WAP54G v1.1|v1.1]] with an additional Mini PCI slot populated.
Default credentials are per the FCC manual. :The default SSIDs are presumed to be '''linksys-a''' and '''linksys-g'''.
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=366002 On the '''DD-WRT''' Forums]
==Images== <gallery caption="[[User:RayKnight|RayKnight]]'s unit"> File:WAP55AG-1.JPG File:WAP55AG-2.JPG File:WAP55AG-3.JPG </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
